name: FlowingSilver
description:
Flowing Silver is a game where you play as a child that must take responsibility for getting water for your family as a result of the water scarcity and the conflict in the area. The child is the oldest sibling in the family and the adult are occupied by other things, so the player character is sent out to find water. Water scarcity is a big problem in several areas of the world and are in many cases a direct result of conflicts. For many people, getting access to water by fetching it outside is a matter between life and death. We want to bring this issue forward by having a game where you must walk around as a child and fetch water in a dangerous environment.

Thanks to everyone at team Task Trolls at NORD University during the 3rd semester ro reach the current state of the game!
